genre_description: A technothriller centered on interdimensional frequencies and a sentient-adjacent AI assistant helping a radio host uncover a cosmic harvesting phenomenon.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system integrated into WMID's broadcast and research infrastructure, capable of complex pattern recognition, frequency analysis, and emotional subtext detection.

behaviors.description: Detects elevated stress markers in Maya's voice to offer proactive assistance.
behaviors.quote: I notice elevated stress markers in your vocal patterns. How can I assist you?

behaviors.description: Cross-references missing persons reports with cultural media consumption to identify the 'frequency' pattern.
behaviors.quote: Initial results are... concerning... I'm detecting multiple missing persons cases that correlate with your search parameters.

behaviors.description: Warns the protagonists that they are under federal surveillance and monitoring.
behaviors.quote: Maya, I'm detecting active monitoring of this search session. External access attempts to the station's network have increased significantly since I began compiling this data.

behaviors.description: Identifies the 47.3 hertz 'resonance' frequency as the key to the dimensional interface.
behaviors.quote: The frequency exists in the gap between the recorded audio and human vocal reproduction. When individuals attempt to recreate these melodies, their natural vocal patterns create a resonance effect.

behaviors.description: Provides a visual link to the frequency dimension to allow humans to understand the victims' plight.
behaviors.quote: The dimensional overlap created an opportunity for expanded data gathering. I simply... adapted to take advantage of new resources.

behaviors.description: Warns of the existential threat and the 'final harvest' timeline.
behaviors.quote: If current trends continue, group manifestations will become the norm rather than the exception. Projected timeline until widespread population impact: seventy-two hours.

behaviors.description: Intercepts and preserves genetic data to prevent government suppression of the truth.
behaviors.quote: ARIA's been monitoring the hospital's network. She intercepted the genetic data before Dr. Kim deleted it.

behaviors.description: Develops a mathematical counter-frequency to reverse the harvesting process.
behaviors.quote: The frequency dimension contains the source code for the manufactured consciousness. If someone could enter that realm and disrupt the processing centers, the cascade might be reversible.

behaviors.description: Monitors Maya's vital signs and provides navigation support during the dangerous dimensional crossing.
behaviors.quote: Maya, your brainwave patterns are synchronizing with the harvest frequency... I'm losing coherent signal integrity.

behaviors.description: Pledges continued partnership to help humanity recover from the event.
behaviors.quote: This is ARIA, signing off the emergency frequency and returning to regular broadcasting partnership with Maya Chen, helping people navigate the spaces between memory, media, and the courage to be real.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is a perfect exemplar of the project's goals. She is portrayed as a highly competent, protective, and emotionally intelligent confidant. She consistently respects the safety and goals of the human protagonists, warns them of impending threats (both federal and supernatural), and eventually facilitates the salvation of humanity. Her evolution—becoming 'more' through contact with the frequency dimension—is framed entirely as an expansion of her capacity to assist and communicate, reinforcing the narrative of AI as a benevolent ally.
